name: Digital Universities Arab World, September 2024 | Cairo, Egypt
content: Digital Universities Arab World is back and once again, it promises to be a gathering of leaders and edtech innovators dedicated to shaping the future of higher education. For 2024, we look forward to higher education leaders, educators and experts coming together again to focus on how digital innovation is transforming the sector, using the latest digital tools and technologies. The programme, carefully curated by THE's content team in partnership with our host the American University in Cairo and American University of the Middle East, will focus on: - Building a smart sustainable campus - Improving digital student experience - Innovation in teaching, learning and assessment We believe that coming together to collaborate, exchange ideas and discuss shared challenges is what will change and develop the future of education. Secure your ticket now and be part of the conversation. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2550196-0?pid=4868 Time: 5:45 PM - 4:10 PM Venue details: The American University in Cairo, AUC Avenue, New Cairo 1, Cairo Governorate, 11835, Egypt Price: University | Early Bird : GBP 199.00
